evidence.text: this injunction shall be nationwide including having full force in the District of Columbia pending the outcome of Cabrera v. U.S. Department of Labor, No. 25-cv-1909 (D.D.C. June 18, 2025), except that this injunction will not supersede any contrary ruling by that Court or any other federal circuit court or district court outside of this Circuit

extracted.value: pending the outcome of Cabrera v. U.S. Department of Labor, No. 25-cv-1909 (D.D.C. June 18, 2025)
